\Aura\Uri\Path

Tags

Properties

$format

$format : string

The dot-format extension of the last path element, including the dot (for example, the ".rss" in "feed.rss").

Type

string

Tags

None found

Methods

__toString()

__toString() : string

Returns the path array as a string, including the format.

Returns

string —

The path string.

Tags

None found

setFromString()

setFromString(string $path) : void

Sets the $path array and $format value from a string.

This will overwrite any previous values.

Parameters

string $path

The path string to use; for example, "/foo/bar/baz/dib.gir". A leading slash will not create an empty first element; if the string has a leading slash, it is ignored.

Tags

None found

setFormat()

setFormat(string $format) : void

Set the dot-format; remember to include the leading dot.

Parameters

string $format

Tags

None found

getFormat() : string

Get the dot-format extension.
